venue.name: A.D. Makepeace Company Headquarters at Tihonet Village

item.description:
Cranberry Festival

The Cape Cod Cranberry Growers' Association has teamed up with the A.D. Makepeace Company, the world's largest cranberry grower, to present the annual Cranberry Harvest Celebration.

Now in our ninth year, the Celebration is a way to showcase this unique industry and its impact on our economy and our culture in southeastern Massachusetts.

Our 2012 lineup is set! Visit our Artisans page to learn more about our fine juried crafters, our Food page to plan your snacks, our Children's page to see what fun we have in store for the little ones, and our Inns, Attractions, and Make a Weekend pages to plan the rest of your trip.

10:00 A.M. - 4:00 P.M, rain or shine.

  • Admission: $5, Seniors $3, Children under 7 under are free
  • Free Parking
  • For more information, visit the Cranberry Harvest web site or call 508-322-4000
  • ï»¿

Deb's Cell 508-415-0590
item.name: Last Minute Cranberry Festival
